item.title: RS34 announces The Clean Rooms Project – Karous ports for modern hardware and Karous 2: The Diffused Sanguis
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/rs34-announces-the-clean-rooms-project-karous-ports-for-modern-hardware-and-karous-2-the-diffused-sanguis

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Ports crowdfunding campaign begins November 11.

RS34 has announced “The Clean Rooms Project,” a new initiative to bring back its 2006-released arcade vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up game Karous with ports for Switch and PC (Steam), as well as a brand-new sequel, Karous 2: The Diffused Sanguis, for unannounced platforms.

The Tokyo-based developer will open a Campfire crowdfunding campaign for the Karasu ports on November 11 at 21:00 JST. It will seek 2.5 million yen (approx. $16,464 USD) to fund the Switch port, which is targeting a September 2025 release in Japan, with a stretch goal of three million yen (approx. $19,760 USD) to fund the PC port, which is targeting a November 2025 release. There will also be stretch goals for a physical edition for Switch at five million yen (approx. $32,938 USD), and PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 ports at six million yen (approx. $39,518 USD).

Karous first launched for arcades on November 15, 2006 in Japan. Ports were released for Dreamcast on March 8, 2007, Wii on April 10, 2008, and Xbox 360 via Sakura Flamingo Archives on November 27, 2014. A separate entry, Karous The Beast Of Re:Eden, was also released for 3DS on January 23, 2014. The game is notable for its various distinctive elements, such as black-and-white graphics, drum and bass-based music, a growth system, and friendly difficulty for shoot ’em up beginners.

item.title: Fairy Tail 2 details game-original story
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/fairy-tail-2-details-game-original-story

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Unlocked after clearing the main story.

Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Gust have released new information, video, and screenshots for Fairy Tail 2 introducing its game-original story that unlocks after clearing the main story.

Features a Game-Original Story You Can Only See in this Title!

See what happens after the Alvarez Empire Arc in the original story “Key to the Unknown”!

Also experience new sides to the characters from FAIRY TAIL only found in this game through “Character Stories”!

Key to the Unknown

After clearing the main story, a new journey that spans across the sprawling world map, the “Key to the Unknown,” begins. All four of its chapters can only be experienced through this game-original story.

—Visit areas previously unobtainable in the main story as the adventure expands! Taking place in the west, “Investigating the Golden Tales”! has you locating a restaurant in the forest in order to obtain a hidden treasure. has you locating a restaurant in the forest in order to obtain a hidden treasure. You have to pretend to be a couple to get in, though…

—A restaurant tucked away somewhere in the forest of Fiore, run by a “Monster Chef,” is said to hide a certain “treasure” that is rumored to be hidden in the restaurant; but it seems that only lovebirds can enter..? Find out the secrets of this restaurant, which can only be discovered through this game.

—Monster Chef is a mysterious monster who runs a restaurant in the forest. He is a romantic who lives for love, but a strange incident causes him to run amok. Can Lucy and her friends bring him back to his senses and get to the “treasure” in the restaurant?

—Gildarts, who has consumed a drink that “deepens your feelings for the person you love,” is even more concerned about Cana than usual, and searches for her from east to west. However, the seemingly foolish parental figure has deep feelings that only Gildarts and Cana can share… This is a story that also offers a glimpse into the feelings of each team member towards their “parents.”

—After the battle, we head over to Akane Beach… The “Key to the Unknown” arc, which takes place after the main story, includes an encounter with an unexpected character. Apparently, she is not the only member of the Spriggan 12 visiting the beach…

A Moment with Your Companions

At the campfires in each area, episodes of Fairy Tail’s members are depicted fully voiced. (Voices are in Japanese only.) As you progress through the story or level up your characters, new episodes are unlocked.

Fairy Tail 2 is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on December 12 in Japan and December 13 worldwide. Because of the time difference, the PC version will be available on December 11 in the west.
